channel.title: Neurofunk drum and bass in Auxy
channel.description: Has anyone made any neurofunk/dark dnb in Auxy? I’ve made an 8 bar loop but I’m struggling to produce those Neuro bass sounds. Any tips would be much appreciated. Also would love to hear a neuro tune if anyone has made one in Auxy

item.title: Neurofunk drum and bass in Auxy
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
Some automations go by 1/12th or 1/24th patterns and some go by 1/16th or 1/32nd patterns. Whilst this may sound fine when playing them apart, if you have triplets playing with normal patterns the beat becomes “muddy”, per se, especially at higher tempos ^1. This could be desired, which is fine, but I usually try to separate the two so the beat is more distinguished (if that makes sense)

  1. At a slower BPM, it can be used to make what’s called a polyrhythm, which is sick for experimentation

Read full topic
item.source: Neurofunk drum and bass in Auxy
